name: Plasma Jockey
oracle_text:
Whenever Plasma Jockey attacks, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.
Blitz {2}{R} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Hold for Ransom
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block and has "{7}: Hold for Ransom's controller sacrifices it and draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery."
flavor_text:
"Let's find out how much your friends think you're worth."
—Gino, hired kidnapper

name: Big Score
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, draw a card.
Draw two tokens and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "Unimaginable riches? I assure you, I have a *vivid* imagination."

name: Cabaretti Initiate
oracle_text: {2}{R/W}: Cabaretti Initiate gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Now there's a fellow who knows how to have a good time!"
—Jetmir

name: "Supportive BFF"
oracle_text:
"Supportive BFF" enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
Whenever "Supportive BFF" attacks, up to one other target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Slip Out the Back
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until your next turn.)

name: Jetmir's Fixer
oracle_text: {R}{G}: Jetmir's Fixer gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If mana from a Treasure was spent to activate this ability, put a +1/+1 counter on Jetmir's Fixer instead.
flavor_text: When you lose Jetmir's trust, his family makes sure you lose everything else.

name: Deal Gone Bad
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Target player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"Feed the rumor mills with delicious treachery. Bad blood between those two is a good deal for us."
—Kamiz, Obscura Oculus

name: Whack
oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a white creature.
Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

name: Citizen's Crowbar
oracle_text:
When Citizen's Crowbar enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token, then attach Citizen's Crowbar to it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has "{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Citizen's Crowbar: Destroy target artifact or enchantment."
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Torch Breath
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a blue permanent.
This spell can't be countered.
Torch Breath deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker.

name: "Rocket Pickpocket"
oracle_text:
When "Rocket Pickpocket" dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Blitz {2}{R} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
